attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have an idea to save a lot of jobs, increase tax revenue, reduce carbon footprints, increase Labours popularity, save the UK car industry and allow a positive upturn in the population's overall moral. All UK produced cars to be made available to taxpayers for a tax suppliment (similar to the motability scheme) if that paticular tax payer chooses to buy a low range, economical and UK produced car. More derails and a breakdown of the scheme available from me.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
